zh: 遇难则退只会使你们改变。
en: Confronting difficulty by quitting leaves you changed.

zh: 大学是我们需要自己做出重要决定，并为这些决定承担责任的时期。
en: The college years are when we start to make crucial decisions on our own and become responsible for them.

zh: 遇见来自世界各地不同地方的人, 帮我们开阔了视野并更好地理解彼此。
en: Meeting people from different parts of the world helps broaden our view and understand each other better.

zh: 那天晚上，我完成了一份20页的营销方案，它合乎逻辑且合理可行。
en: I developed a twenty-page marketing plan that night, which was logical, reasonable and feasible.

zh: 时至今日，我仍然好奇他是否也暗自地为我感到骄傲。
en: Even to this day, I wonder if he was secretly proud of me as well.

zh: 一切就这么简单，但你仍可能好奇这会引出怎样颇具见地的论述。
en: So far so simple，but you may wonder how this leads to anything insightful.

zh: 在许多现实生活的现象中，个人主义的行为会给社会带来负面后果。
en: In many real life phenomena，individualistic behaviors lead to negative outcomes for society.

zh: 在全球经济竞争的背景下，这说起来容易做起来难。
en: This is much easier said than done in a global context of economic competition.

zh: 我们每个人的内心深处都有一个创业者。
en: There is an entrepreneur that exists deep down inside of each of us.

zh: 企业家精神的历史显示了它广泛的影响力和重要性。
en: The history of entrepreneurship speaks of its widespread power and significance.

zh: 我站在嶙峋的山峰之间，薄雾轻笼。
en: I stand amid a jagged series of peaks enveloped in a haze.

zh: 丝绸之路是一段关乎人类境况的旅程。
en: The Silk road is a trip considered important to the human condition.

zh: 早期的旅行者很有可能被人为或气候的危险击倒。
en: These early travelers could be felled by perils both human and climatic.

zh: 这些物品蕴含着情感财富和情感力量。
en: These objects are inscribed with emotional wealth and power.

zh: 它们是将家庭凝聚在一起的故事。
en: These are the narratives that help hold families together.

zh: 由于更好的食物、住房、公共卫生以及一些药物，人类的平均寿命得到了极大增长。
en: Average lifespans have risen a lot because of better food, housing, public health and some medicines.

zh: 养老金储备必须足够巨大，才能支撑人们更长久的寿命。
en: Pension pots would have to be enormous to support one’s extended lifespans.

zh: 许多疾病在人年轻时可以被抵御住，但却会在人进入老年时接踵而来。
en: Many health problems are guarded against in youth, but crammed into old age.

zh: 当你感到压力、醉酒、焦虑或者疼痛时，你发送的短信可能出错。
en: Texting can go wrong when you are stressed, drunk, anxious or in pain.

zh: 通过某些聊天软件发送的信息一般只留存很短的时间。
en: Messages sent via some chat apps are usually only available for a short time.

zh: 悲痛的暴风雨过去些之后，她便独自回了房间。
en: When the storm of grief had spent itself, she went away to her room alone.

zh: 她坐在那里，仰着头靠在椅垫上，几乎一动不动
en: She sat with her head thrown back upon the cushion of the chair, quite motionless.

zh: 她很年轻，有一张美丽冷静的脸，脸上线条还显示出了她的些许坚强。
en: She was young, with a fair, calm face, whose lines even bespoke a certain strength.

zh: 空气中蕴涵了这么多的活力和甜蜜，闭门不出简直是一种折磨。
en: The air had so much life and sweetness that it was a pain to come within doors.

zh: 真善美三者，只是一个本体的三个方面的表现而已。
en: Truth, and goodness, and beauty are but different faces of the same all.

zh: 在中国，教育有着悠久的历史，积累了非常丰富的教育思想。
en: Boasting a long history, Chinese education is rich in educational thoughts.

zh: 儒商文化的诸多内容对于今天的企业发展仍有十分积极的作用。
en: Much of the content of Confucian entrepreneurship still has a very positive effect on the development of today’s enterprises.

zh: 这种信念的核心是个人想去冒险、去探索和去适应。
en: At the core of this belief is an individual’s willingness to take risks, to explore and to adapt.

zh: 白堤的两旁是一排排绿柳。
en: On either side Of Bai Causeway stand rows of willow trees.

zh: 中国文化与冰雪元素相结合，充分体现了自然、文化、体育之美。
en: Chinese culture, combined with the elements of ice and snow, has fully demonstrated the beauty of nature, culture and sports.

zh: 儒家思想注重人的自身修养和人与人之间的和谐关系。
en: Confucianism attached great importance to self-cultivation and harmonious relationship with each other.

zh: 在中国，梅兰竹菊被判为花中四君子。
en: In China, the plum blossom, orchid, bamboo and chrysanthemum are praised as the four gentlemen of Chinese flowers.

zh: 中国戏曲的起源可以追溯到原始社会的歌舞和宗教仪式。
en: The origin of Chinese Opera can be traced back to the singing and dancing as well as religious rituals in primitive times.

zh: 在消除贫困的过程中，中国正扮演着越来越重要的角色。
en: China is playing an increasingly important role in the process of eradicating poverty.

zh: 杭州拥有十分丰富的非物质文化遗产资源。
en: Hangzhou abounds in rich resources of intangible cultural heritage.

zh: 有机农业可以服务于多种目的，如食品安全和可持续发展。
en: The organic agriculture can serve a variety of purposes, including food safety and sustainable development.

zh: 中国进一步加大体育馆建设投资，以更好地满足人们的健身需求。
en: China has further increased its investment in gym construction to better meet people’s demand for fitness.

zh: 推进“一带一路”建设，是加强和世界各国互利合作的需要。
en: The Belt and Road Initiative will enable China to strengthen its mutually beneficial cooperation with other countries.

zh: 人民健康是民族昌盛和国家富强的重要标志。
en: A healthy population is a key mark of a prosperous nation and a strong country.

zh: 中国越来越重视公共图书馆，并鼓励人们充分加以利用。
en: China attaches increasing importance to public libraries and encourages people to make full use of them.
